trans-unit.source: A base type for handlers which only do some small processing of request and/or response messages.
trans-unit.target: 仅对进行一些小型处理的请求和/或响应消息处理的处理程序的基类型。

trans-unit.source: The actual creation of response messages is delegated to an inner handler.
trans-unit.target: 响应消息的实际创建委托给内部处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The MessageProcessingHandler is useful if the handler doesn't require asynchronous operations, because operations on request and response messages are fast.
trans-unit.target: MessageProcessingHandler 很有用如果处理程序不要求异步操作，因为对请求和响应消息的操作非常快。

trans-unit.source: The most common usage is to derive from this class and override the <xref:System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler.ProcessResponse%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 最常见用法是从此类派生，并重写<xref:System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler.ProcessResponse%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler.ProcessResponse%2A> </xref:System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a <xref href="System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a <xref href="System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler"></xref> class with a specific inner handler.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.Net.Http.MessageProcessingHandler"></xref>与特定的内部处理程序类。

trans-unit.source: The inner handler which is responsible for processing the HTTP response messages.
trans-unit.target: 内部处理程序即负责处理 HTTP 响应消息。

trans-unit.source: Performs processing on each request sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 每个请求发送到服务器上执行处理。

trans-unit.source: An application would override this method to implement custom processing of the HTTP request message before it is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序将重写此方法以实现自定义在处理 HTTP 请求消息发送到服务器之前。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request message to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 HTTP 请求消息。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用由其他对象或线程用以接收取消通知取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request message that was processed.
trans-unit.target: 处理 HTTP 请求消息。

trans-unit.source: Perform processing on each response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 在每个响应从服务器上执行处理。

trans-unit.source: An application would override this method to implement custom processing of the HTTP response message after it is received from the server.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序将重写此方法以从服务器接收后实现的 HTTP 响应消息的自定义处理。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP response message to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 HTTP 响应消息。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用由其他对象或线程用以接收取消通知取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP response message that was processed.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 响应消息进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Sends an HTTP request to the inner handler to send to the server as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTTP 请求发送到要发送到与异步操作的服务器的内部处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This operation does not block.
trans-unit.target: 此操作不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: This overridable implementation of SendAsync method forwards the HTTP request to the inner handler to send to the server as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 此可重写实现的 SendAsync 方法将转发到内部处理程序的 HTTP 请求将发送到服务器以异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP request message to send to the server.
trans-unit.target: 要向服务器发送的 HTTP 请求消息。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用由其他对象或线程用以接收取消通知取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: The request was .
trans-unit.target: The request was .
